feed.title: SWAG Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SWAG: 3.0.0-ls334
entry.content:
LinuxServer Changes:

Fix naming issue with Dynu plugin. If you are using Dynu, please make sure your credentials are set in /config/dns-conf/dynu.ini and your DNSPLUGIN variable is set to dynu (not dynudns).

PIP Changes:

Updating PIP version of certbot to 3.0.0
